title: ‘We Are More and More Performers’: Romain Bardet Misses ‘Human’ Side of Pro Cycling
content:
French climber says that winning the Giro d’Italia is a big dream, limits his future Tour de France ambitions.

Read the full article at ‘We Are More and More Performers’: Romain Bardet Misses ‘Human’ Side of Pro Cycling on Velo.
author: sstokes
